job.title: Java Software Engineer
job.description:
1oT is expanding its team and looking for an engineer to join us in building connectivity solutions according to the new eSIM IoT standard.
1oT has built a platform for helping global IoT service providers manage their SIM cards and billing. The self-service based platform enables users to control and monitor SIM card sessions, switch SIM cards on/off, buy new SIMs, send SMS to the SIM, etc. Our client portfolio ranges from e-mobility to asset tracking to smart city solutions, so you will have interaction with a variety of IoT sectors and telecom companies.
eSIM team owns services that implement the eSIM standard of GSMA.

What you'll do::
Develop large-scale services ( Java / REST / Spring / SQL )
Contribute to back-office UI ( Vue.js )
Run and maintain AWS services ( Terraform / Docker / Grafana )
Participate in discussions on the architecture of the platform
Build eSIM infrastructure according to GSMA specs
Handle external integrations via APIs

What you'll bring::
3+ years of development experience (Java / REST / Spring / SQL)
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS / Azure / GCP)
Familiarity with modern UI frameworks is a plus
Experience with cryptography or HSM is a strong plus
Background in working with APIs

Youre a good fit if you..:
enjoy solving problems and turning ideas into clean, working solutions
take ownership of your tasks deadlines, goals, responsibilities
like collaborating, sharing ideas, and joining technical discussions
prefer action over bureaucracy and dont get stuck in corporate slow-motion
are curious, eager to learn, and excited about building things that dont yet exist
bring a positive, high-accountability approach to teamwork

Additional requirements:
Ability to work with APIs and integrations
Comfortable with security-focused development approaches
Willingness to collaborate closely with the eSIM team
A degree in Computer Science or a related field is beneficial but not mandatory. Practical experience matters more.

What we offer::
Meaningful, globally impactful work on cutting-edge eSIM technology
Diverse development tasks: new features, optimizations, refactoring
Opportunity to grow, influence, and shape products in a scaling company
Cozy, productive environment in our Tallinn HQ
Ambitious teammates who challenge the status quo daily
Supportive and fun team atmosphere
